item.description:
Altered Dominos!
For this meeting, we will be exploring ways to work with dominos. There are several links in the message boards on the Meetup group page for review. Please bring some dominos (any size, any material) and some permanent ink (such as Stazon) or Sharpies. We will have a selection of rubber stamps and collage images, but feel free to bring anything you would like to use in the creative process.
item.how_to_find_us: Go up the stairs on the right immediately inside the front entrance. Look for #2

group.name: The Altered Art and Assemblage Meetup Group

item.name: Altered Dominos!
